oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Pharmacokinetic and Tissue Residue Depletion Study after Intramuscular Injection of Leotrox (Sulfatroxazole (STX)/Trimethoprim (TMP)) Combination in Calves
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Szancer, J.
Edwards, H. J.
Kissmeyer, A. M.
Pott, J. M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: pharmacokinetic profile
Tissue Residue
tissue depletion
Sulfatroxazole
Trimethoprim
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The object of this study was to determine 1) lung and plasma pharmacokinetic profiles of STX and TMP, 2) tissue depletion and residues of STX and TMP.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1992: Volume 3; 164-167
